name: Dawnshard
storyline:
“At the beginning of Time, the universe was compact in a perfect sphere that lightly glowed into the Void. A single planet, perfect in every aspect. Ouros. Then there was the Explosion and with that Ouros shattered.
Thrown thousands of light-years away, the shards of Ouros traveled right into the Void, inert for millennia.
Then from the Void they lit, and created Life. Billions of planets, creatures, plants. All came from the Dawnshards.”

In the universe, six Worlds have discovered the existence of the Dawnshards:
- Court of the 7 Vessels
- Army of Darkness
- Golden Wings Order
- Ancestral Lodge
- Progeny Beyond Time
- Lost Eden
These Worlds are now fighting each other to get them, as they wield the power of creation. Each World seeks this power for a specific purpose, hidden to the other Worlds.
summary:
Dawnshard is a multiplayer fantasy card game for pc and mobile devices. Focused on eSport and competition, players can get NFT assets by playing the game.

Dawnshard is the first digital card game that integrates procedural generation in deck building, with the intention of removing the meta-game.

Playing Dawnshard feels like exploring a Jungle. In the Jungle, you have the tools you have.

You can’t just look up what the best strategies are. You'll have to adapt during each game to your opponent's strategies!
